definitions.definition: A U-shaped piece of wood used as a collar for an ox , the upper parts of which are fastened to its yoke .
A meander in a river ; the land enclosed by such a loop .

main_definition: A U-shaped piece of wood used as a collar for an ox , the upper parts of which are fastened to its yoke .
secondary_definitions: A meander in a river ; the land enclosed by such a loop .
